scripts.deploy: npm run build && cp dist/app.js ../wrike-ws-host-app/web/assets/wrike_game/app.js && cp -R assets/game_assets ../wrike-ws-host-app/web/assets/
scripts.real-deploy: npm run build && ditto dist/ deploy/dist && ditto assets/ deploy/assets && ditto index.html deploy/ && surge deploy/ fluke-game.surge.sh && rm -rf deploy
